  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.window used by org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.metrics 
    Class and Description
    RollingWindowManager
    A class to manage the set of RollingWindows.
    RollingWindowManager.TopWindow
    Represents a snapshot of the rolling window.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.window used by org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.top.window 
    Class and Description
    RollingWindow
    A class for exposing a rolling window view on the event that occur over time.
    RollingWindow.Bucket
    Thread-safety is provided by synchronization when resetting the update time as well as atomic fields.
    RollingWindowManager.NameValuePair
    A pair of a name and its corresponding value.
    RollingWindowManager.Op
    Represents an operation within a TopWindow.
    RollingWindowManager.RollingWindowMap 
    RollingWindowManager.TopN
    A fixed-size priority queue, used to retrieve top-n of offered entries.
    RollingWindowManager.TopWindow
    Represents a snapshot of the rolling window.
    RollingWindowManager.User
    Represents a user who called an Op within a TopWindow.
